title: Land Development charges shall not be charged for lands under declared slum rehabilitation areas
clause_text: Land Development charges shall not be charged for lands under declared slum rehabilitation areas. Building Development charges shall not be to payable for rehabilitation component. However, infrastructural improvement charges shall be paid to S.R.A. and the concerned Planning Authority as per provision in clause (7) below, at the prevailing rates within the areas of respective Municipal Corporations for their areas for the built-up area, over and above the permissible F.S.I. of the zone. These charges shall also apply to the transit camp.
section: PAYMENTS TO BE MADE TO SRA AND INSTALMENTS :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
